short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy CSS Selector is a tool to locate web elements easily. Useful for designers, developers, and researchers in web projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It enables designers, developers, and researchers to effortlessly identify and copy precise CSS Selectors for any web element, significantly reducing time spent on manual DOM navigation and debugging. Made by your friends at Samelogic.com!
